<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1965</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Project:A backstage insight into a TV Program</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Project:A Bühne hinter dem Vorhangeinblick in ein 
Fernsehapparat Programm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aperçu des coulisses de Project:A d'un programme
de TV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introspecção backstage de Project:A em um 
programa da tevê</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visione backstage di Project:A di un programma 
della TV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Project:A διορατικότητα παρασκηνίων σε ένα 
πρόγραμμα TV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Penetración entre bastidores de Project:A en un 
programa de la TV</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a guide for a beginner English student project where they research a TV program of their own choice .The project includes written and oral presentations. Assessment rubrics, time schedule , checklist and reflection forms are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">backstage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">television program</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Anleitung für ein englisches 
Kursteilnehmerprojekt des Anfängers, in dem sie ein Fernsehapparat 
Programm ihres eigenen auserlesenen The Projektes einschließen die 
geschriebenen und Munddarstellungen erforschen. Einschätzung 
Rubriken, Zeitplan, Checkliste und Reflexion Formulare werden zur 
Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un guide pour un projet anglais d'étudiant
de débutant où ils recherchent un programme de TV de leur propre 
projet bien choisi de The inclut des présentations écrites et 
orales. Des rubriques d'évaluation, le calendrier, la liste de 
contrôle et les formes de réflexion sont fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma guia para um projeto inglês do 
estudante do novato onde pesquisem um programa da tevê de seu 
próprio projeto bem escolhido do The incluam apresentações escritas
e orais. Os rubrics da avaliação, a programação de tempo, a 
lista de verificação e os formulários da reflexão são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida per un progetto inglese 
dell'allievo del principiante dove ricercano un programma della TV del
loro proprio progetto choice del The includono le presentazioni 
scritte ed orali. Le rubriche di valutazione, i tempi previsti, 
la lista di controllo e le forme di riflessione sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας οδηγός για ένα αγγλικό έργο 
σπουδαστών αρχαρίων όπου ερευνούν ένα πρόγραμμα TV της 
επιλογής τους. Το πρόγραμμα περιλαμβάνει τις γραπτές και 
προφορικές παρουσιάσεις. Οι μορφές ρουμπρικών αξιολόγησης, 
χρονικού προγράμματος, πινάκων ελέγχου και αντανάκλασης 
παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía para un proyecto inglés del 
estudiante del principiante donde investigan un programa de la TV de 
su propio proyecto bien escogido del The incluyen presentaciones 
escritas y orales. Se proporcionan las rúbricas del gravamen, 
el horario de tiempo, la lista de comprobación y las formas de la 
reflexión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bühne hinter dem Vorhang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fernsehenprogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">à l'arrière plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">émission télévisée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">backstage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma televisivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρασκήνια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τηλεοπτικό πρόγραμμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">entre bastidores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">programa de la televisión</string>
          </keyword>
